title: Video: Dose – Stay
content:
Ohio producer Dose goes all Lana Del Rey on us in this music video for recent track Stay.

Spliced together VHS reels amidst an overarching sense of melancholic nostalgia, the visuals are fitting to the laid-back ‘glo-fi’ vibe of the music itself. Whilst checking this track out, I realised just how criminally underrated Dose aka Jeremy Rike is; with several top-quality releases to his name, it’s surely only his admirable lack of self-promotion that prevents him from hitting the blog-heights. Check out Stay below and keep up with Dose over on Facebook.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
